short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Practice and improve your British English pronunciation every time you open a new tab in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Practice and improve your British English pronunciation every time you open a new tab in your browser! 

Have you been looking to improve your British English pronunciation? Simply British English is the extension you need.

With this extension you can practice, spelling the word using the IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet).

You can also check that your pronunciation is correct by clicking the word itself.

And the best thing yet, practicing your British English pronunciation is as simple as opening a new tab.
